meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Katchmer Robert Plunkett Julie Harris Neiger Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1116.

div.div: J! round & 15 clues of DJ! round only

td.p: John Katchmer, a word processor originally from Millersville, Pennsylvania
Robert Plunkett, an attorney from Simi Valley, California
Julie Harris Neiger, a teacher from San Diego, California

tr.td: AUTHORS
TRANSPORTATION
WEDDINGS
SPORTS
POTLUCK
DOUBLE TALK

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'As a teenager, she cut her hair, dressed in boyish clothes & called herself William Cather')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: As a teenager, she cut her hair, dressed in boyish clothes & called herself William Cather

Julie
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_2', 'clue_J_3_2_stuck', '(Alex: We\'ve got less than a minute.)
...
[The song was played again going into the break.]

"Wedding Bell Blues"

Julie
')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_3_2', 'clue_J_3_2_stuck', '(AUDIO DAILY DOUBLE) Title of the following in which Marilyn McCoo addressed her then-fiance, Billy Davis Jr.: " and love won\'t carry me
till you marry me Bill / Bill I love you so / I always will / And in your voice I hear a choir of carousels..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
(AUDIO DAILY DOUBLE) Title of the following in which Marilyn McCoo addressed her then-fiance, Billy Davis Jr.: " and love won't carry me
till you marry me Bill / Bill I love you so / I always will / And in your voice I hear a choir of carousels..."
